duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the delivery of transmission, substation, distribution, gas, and/or information technology projects with cross-functional teams and multiple disciplines.
Manage project scope, schedule, budget, and safety performance of multiple projects and programs.
Coordinate project requirements and interface with external and internal stakeholders to ensure project costs, schedule, scope, and risks are managed.
Coach and lead team members to ensure project team members understand their respective responsibilities and complete assigned tasks.
Interact routinely with key internal and external stakeholders including senior management, the Utility's customers, and governmental and regulatory officials.
Develop and implement process enhancements and efficiencies, including technology and performance improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in engineering or related field and 2 - 4 years relevant project management or related experience (Master's preferred)
